So, we're at a wrong spot, but I'm starting to understand, a little bit more and we'll discover the Gate.
This is the 4th dead end today; do you really trust the fairytale from Navi?
Much is said about the Labyrinth ...
Maybe a Protean city lies at its center, one full of advanced technologies and culture.
Maybe Proteans are still alive.
Or, maybe there is a portal into another world, into paradise, into the underworld, or do you know the legend of lost Atlantis?
However, everything may be completely different, maybe there is no Gate.
Photocell is a switch, which reacts to activity in its immediate proximity. Just as the mine reacts to live creatures and an explosion.
